name: Marine Stealth: Sniper Shooter
description:
Marine Stealth Sniper gives you the chance to enter in deep waters to protect your ocean, the waters that you are trained to defend. Terrorists are lurking around in their boats, and comming closer to attack the base, to stop their terrorist activities, you have to snip them out. stay stealth, dont let them know who is killing them.
once you are spotted, Game is over
